nodes.text: Doctor Aphra 7 is the seventh issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra. It was written by Alyssa Wong, illustrated by Minkyu Jung, and first published by Marvel Comics on January 20, 2021. It features the story "The Engine Job Part 2: The Offer," in which Chelli Aphra and Sana Starros pay a visit to Lady Proxima on Corellia.

THE OFFER! Hired by DOMINA TAGGE, APHRA sets her sights on a mysterious piece of tech that could shift the balance of the galactic civil war. Her hunt takes her to CORELLIA… and to SANA STARROS' doorstep! But Aphra's not the only one on Corellia with an eye on the tech…!
